ComicInfo.Summary:
You've heard the rumors. You've heard the tales. The Malicious Melora and her band of Vicious Vixens.
So, hide your children and lock your doors. Melora comes.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------------------|-------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Dan Mendoza | 1 | | B | Tattered & Torn Cover B, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | | C | Pin-Up Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Zoe Stanley | 3 | | D | Pin-Up Tattered & Torn Cover D, Limited to 2000 | Zoe Stanley | 4 | | E | "Real Girl" Cover E, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | "Real Girl" Tattered & Torn Cover F, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
Note: The digital edition (2/28/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Part One
